response.original_title: The Big Game XXVIII - Road Runner Vs Wile E. Coyote
response.overview: The Big Game XXVIII: Road Runner Vs. Coyote was a four-hour marathon of Looney Tunes cartoons that aired on Cartoon Network from 6 to 10 PM on 29 January 2000, and again from 1 PM to 5 PM the very next day. It was the third installment in the "Big Game" series of marathon specials parodying the Super Bowl.
response.title: The Big Game XXVIII - Road Runner Vs Wile E. Coyote
